mapper.select: select user_name ,gender ,birthday ,symptom from usertable u join reservation r on(u.user_id = r.user_id) where r.reserve_no=#{reserveNo}

select clinic_no ,clinic_date ,clinic_symptom ,specificity ,perscription_yn from clinic where patient_no = (select patient_no from patient where user_id=#{uid} and hospital_id=#{hid}) order by clinic_date desc
select medicine_name ,dosage ,dose_cnt ,dose_day from perscription p join medicine d on (p.medicine_no = d.medicine_no) where clinic_no =#{clinicNo}
select * from medicine where medicine_name LIKE #{medicineName}||'%'
